snippet: A former justice of the peace, Eric Williams, was convicted of capital murder Thursday for a revenge plot against a district attorney, his wife and a top assistant.
abstract: Eric Williams, former Texas justice of the peace, is convicted of capital murder for revenge plot against slain District Attorney Mike McLelland of Kaufman County, his wife Cynthia McClelland and a top assistant.
lead_paragraph: A former justice of the peace, Eric Williams, was convicted of capital murder Thursday for a revenge plot against a district attorney, his wife and a top assistant.

headline.main: Texas: Murder Verdict in Revenge Plot
headline.print_headline: Texas: Murder Verdict in Revenge Plot
